member.name: T:OxyPlot.Silverlight.ThicknessConverter
member.summary: Converts Thickness to double. This is used to convert BorderThickness properties to Path.StrokeThickness (double). The maximum thickness value is used.

member.name: M:OxyPlot.Silverlight.Plot.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes (such as a rebuilding layout pass) call . In simplest terms, this means the method is called just before a UI element displays in an application. For more information, see Remarks.

member.summary: Refresh the plot immediately (not blocking UI thread)
member.param: if set to true , the data collections will be updated.

member.summary: Draws the specified portion of the specified at the specified location and with the specified size.

The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the portion of the source image to draw.
Width of the portion of the source image to draw.
Height of the portion of the source image to draw.
The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of drawn image.
The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of drawn image.
The width of the drawn image.
The height of the drawn image.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Silverlight.TrackerDefinition.TrackerKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker key.
member.remarks: The Plot will use this property to find the TrackerDefinition that matches the TrackerKey of the current series.

member.name: P:OxyPlot.Silverlight.TrackerDefinition.TrackerTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the tracker template.
member.remarks: The tracker control will be added/removed from the Tracker overlay as neccessary. The DataContext of the tracker will be set to a TrackerHitResult with the current tracker data.
